chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_23
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
ed in field level VHSND above.
1.2.3 Labour Room and Delivery:
i. In place where the HWC is a delivery point the CHO (Nurse) will do the normal delivery of the pregnant 
woman only after getting SBA training. 
ii. All the identified high-risk pregnant women should be referred to higher centre.
iii. CHO will ensure that the labour room is equipped as per the maternal health guidelines and all the 
logistics and drugs as needed in the labour room should be present. 
iv. Partograph should be plotte
